tool_description: Integrates approved vendor information into enterprise systems including ERP, procurement, and accounting platforms with data synchronization and validation.
error_messages: Vendor not approved: Vendor must complete approval process before integration.
Invalid target system: Specified system is not configured for vendor integration.
Integration failed: Unable to connect to one or more target systems.
Data validation error: Vendor data doesn't meet target system requirements.
Sync mode invalid: Use one of [immediate, batch, scheduled].
usage: Provide vendor_id and target_systems array. Optionally specify sync_mode. The tool will integrate vendor data into specified enterprise systems.

system_results.description: Integration result for each target system
